question: who is doing 2018 super bowl half time show
api_result: As of my last update in January 2023, the Super Bowl LII (2018) halftime show was performed by Justin Timberlake. He headlined the Pepsi Super Bowl LII Halftime Show at U.S. Bank Stadium in Minneapolis, Minnesota, on February 4, 2018. This marked Timberlake's third Super Bowl halftime performance, making him the individual with the most appearances by an entertainer at the event.
